mapper.select: SELECT u.userNickname, u.userProfileImage, r.campRateReplyNo, r.campRateReplyCreateTime, r.campRateReplyUpdateTime, r.campRateReplyContent, r.userNo, r.campRateNo FROM user u, campRateReply r WHERE r.userNo = u.userNo AND campRateNo = #{campRateNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO campRateReply(campRateReplyContent, userNo, campRateNo) VALUES( #{campRateReplyContent}, #{userNo}, #{campRateNo} );
